direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods are part of the standard Object class and are often tested together due to their complementary nature.
Both methods provide object-specific information, which can be useful for testing object state.
The state of the Random object is crucial for both equals and getRandomInternal methods.

enhanced_by.reason: Initializing the RandomService with a specific Random object is necessary to set up the state for equals method testing.
Accessing the internal Random object can help verify the state before and after invoking the equals method.
The hashCode method can be used to verify the consistency of object state after invoking the equals method.
